Segment.name: REC
Segment.comment: To indicate the condition of real estate property and, if applicable, the actions needed to correct damage

Field.name: OccupancyCode
Field.comment: Code specifying occupancy status of real estate property

Field.name: PropertyDamageCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the damage to property

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: PropertyInspectionQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating a part of the property being inspected

Field.name: QuantityQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of quantity

Field.name: CompositeUnitOfMeasure
Field.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)

Field.name: OccupancyVerificationCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the method used to verify the occupancy of the property

Field.name: NoteReferenceCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the functional area or purpose for which the note applies
